text: chaos on Turkey streets again as police
Lords of President Aaron clashed with
members of the military attempting a
coup that left Turks unsure who was in
charge of the country it began last
night when rebel soldiers closed the
main bridges in Istanbul effectively
severing the link from Europe to Asia no
look with the dead our hero Marcos it in
hours later an address to the nation a
group from within the ranks of the
military seized control of the state
broadcaster and claimed it was now
running the country as reports
circulated of tanks firing on Parliament
and fighter jets downing a helicopter
filled with Potter's the country's
president took to video messaging to get
his view across we will take all the
necessary steps by standing tall we
cannot behave otherwise and we will not
leave the arena to them I believe that
we will end this invasion as soon as
possible
later he urged his supporters to come
out onto the streets I can say that the
members of the party that I am the
founder of will be hand-in-hand with our
people in city squares and punish those
that are responsible in Istanbul and
Ankara they gathered some mounted the
tanks in defiance grabbing guns from
soldiers hands just a few hours later
president Erewhon appeared at Istanbul
Airport
he promised to overcome what he
described as an uprising by a minority
the identities of those said to have
tried to take charge are not clear nor
the amount of support they had by early
morning these pictures emerged of
